column2: "Na Josia dzii apaho wɔ Jerusalɛm maa EWURADZE: na wokunkum apaho no wɔ bosoom a odzi kan no mu da a otsia duanan no mu."
"Na ɔdze asɔfo no kesisii hɔn ahwɛdodze mu
column3: na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dzen maa EWURADZE fie ɔsom no."

column2: "Na ɔsee Levifo no a wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ Israel nyinara no a wɔyɛ akrɔnkrɔmfo dze ma EWURADZE no dɛ
column3: Hom mfa adaka krɔnkrɔn no mbesi ofi no a David ne ba Israelhen Solomon sii no mu; ɔnnkɛyɛ hom kɔn ho adzesoadze bio: afei hom nsom EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn

column2: "Na hom nsiesie hom ho dɛ mbrɛ hom egyanom efiefi tsetsee wɔ hom nkyekyɛmu mu dɛ mbrɛ Israelhen David ne nkyerɛwee
column3: na dɛ mbrɛ ne ba Solomon ne nkyerɛwee no tse."

column2: "Na hom ngyinagyina bea krɔnkrɔn no do dɛ mbrɛ hom nuanom ɔman no mba no egyanom efiefi mpaapaamu no tsetsee
column3: na wɔmma Levifo egyanom ofi kor nnya kyɛfa kor."

column2: "Na hom nkuku apaho no
column3: na hom nyɛ homho krɔnkrɔn
column4: na hom nsiesie mfa mma hom nuanom
column5: na wɔnyɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n’asɛm a ɔnam Moses nsa do no tse."

column2: "Na Josia yii nguankuw mu
column3: nguambaa na mpɔnkyemba
column5: dɛ wɔmfa ne nyinara nyeyɛ apaho ayɛyɛdze mma hɔn a wohun hɔn wɔ hɔ no nyinara
column7: na anantwisaa so mpemebiasa: iyi nyinara fi ɔhen no n’adze mu."

column2: "Na ne mbapɔmba no so yiyii maa ɔman no
column3: asɔfo no
column5: ayamuyie mu. Hilkia na Zekaria na Jehiel
column7: dze apaho afɔrbɔdze nguan mpemebien ahaesia
column8: na anantwi ahaasa maa asɔfo no."

column2: "Konania so
column3: na Semaia na Netanel
column5: na Hasabia na Jeiel na Jozabad
column8: na anantwi ahaenum maa Levifo no."

column2: "Nna wosiesiee ɔsom no
column3: na asɔfo no gyinagyinaa hɔn gyinabew
column4: na Levifo no so wowɔ hɔn nkyekyɛmu
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ɔhen no ne mbrasɛm no tse."

column2: "Na wokunkum apaho no
column3: na asɔfo no dze bɔgya no a wɔsɔɔw no hɔn nsamu no petsee

column2: "Na woyii ɔhyew afɔr no ma wɔdze aamema dɛ mbrɛ ɔman no mba egyanom efiefi mpaapaamu no tsetsee
column3: dɛ wɔmfa nkɛma EWURADZE
column4: dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Moses nwoma no mu no. Na wɔyɛɛ anantwi no so dɛmara."

column2: "Na wɔdze ogya totoo apaho no dɛ mbrɛ mbra no tse: na afɔrbɔdze krɔnkrɔn no
column3: wɔnoaa no wɔ nsenaba
column6: na wɔmemaa do kɛmaa ɔman mba no ntsɛmara."

column2: "Na n’ekyir no wosiesiei maa hɔnho
column3: na asɔfo no; osiandɛ Aaronmba asɔfo no woennya adagyer wɔ ɔhyew afɔr no bɔ na seradze ne hyew ho araa ma okodur adzesaa: dɛm ntsi na Levifo no siesiee bi maa hɔnho

column2: "Na adwontofo Asafmba no so wɔ hɔn gyinabew dɛ mbrɛ David
column3: na Asaf
column6: mbrasɛm no tse; na mbobowano ahwɛfo no wowɔ kuropon biara ano: wonnyi dɛ wofi hɔn som mu fir
column7: na hɔn nuanom Levifo no siesiei maa hɔn."

column2: "Nna wosiesiee EWURADZE no som no nyinara da no ara
column3: dɛ wobedzi apaho no
column4: na wɔabɔ ɔhyew afɔr wɔ EWURADZE n’afɔrmbukyia no do
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ɔhen Josia ne mbrasɛm no tse."

column2: "Na Israelmba a wohun hɔn wɔ hɔ no dzii apaho no mber no mu
column3: na epitsi afahyɛ no nda esuon."

column2: "Na woenndzi apaho bi a ɔtse dɛ iyi
column3: wɔ Israel
column4: ofitsi nkɔnhyɛnyi Samuel ne nda no mu; nkyii so Israel ahemfo mu biara enndzi dɛm apaho a ɔtse dɛ mbrɛ Josia
column7: na Juda nyinara na Israel a wohun hɔn wɔ hɔ no
column8: na Jerusalɛm mba no dzii no."

column2: "Josia n’ahendzi mu afe a otsia duawɔtwe no mu na wodzii apaho yi."
"Iyi nyinara n’ekyir no
column3: aber a Josia esiesie asɔrfi no
column4: nna Egypthen Neko sii mu kɔr dɛ ɔrokɔko wɔ Karkemis wɔ Eufrates ho: na Josia fiir edzi kehyiaa no."

column2: "Na ɔsomaa abɔfo wɔ ne nkyɛn
column3: dɛ
column4: Ebɛnadze na menye wo wɔ yɛ
column5: ɔwo Judahen? Mammba wo do ndɛ da yi
column6: na mbom ofi a menye no wɔ akodzi no do a; na Nyankopɔn ahyɛ me dɛ menyɛ no ntsɛm: gyaa dɛ edze woho bɛgyegye mu wɔ Nyankopɔn a ɔka mo ho no ho

column2: "Naaso Josia ammpɛ dɛ ɔdan n’ekyir fi no ho
column3: na mbom ɔsakyeer noho ama ɔnye no aakɔko
column4: na oenntsie Neko ne nsɛm no a ofi Nyankopɔn anomu no
column5: na ɔbae bɔkoe wɔ Megiddo bɔnsa no mu."

column2: "Na egyentofo no totowee bobɔɔ ɔhen Josia; na ɔhen no see no nkowaa no dɛ
column3: Hom mfa me mfi ha nkɔ; na mepira dɛ."

column2: "Nna no nkowaa no yii no fii tseaseanam no mu
column3: na wɔdze no koo tseaseanam a otsia ebien no a ɔwɔ no mu
column4: na wɔdze no baa Jerusalɛm; na owui
column5: na wosiee no wɔ n’egyanom asamandan no mu. Na Juda na Jerusalɛm nyinara wogyaam Josia."

column2: "Na Jeremia twaa Josia ho kwadwom: na mbarimba adwontofo na mbaa adwontofo nyinara kaa Josia ho asɛm wɔ kwadwom mu dze bodu ndɛ da yi; na wɔdze yɛɛ mbra wɔ Israel mu: na
column3: hwɛ

column2: "Afei Josia no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: na ne ndzeyɛɛ pa dɛ mbrɛ dza wɔakyerɛw no wɔ EWURADZE ne mbra mu tse
column6: kan dze na ekyir dze no
column8: wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Israel na Juda ahemfo nwoma no mu."
